summary: SummaryMEDIHEAL Teatree Trouble Pad offers multiple refreshing benefits to keep your skin soft, supple, and dewy by helping soothe and calm irritated skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsIt intensively calms and balances acne-prone and sensitive skinInstantly helps soothe irritated skin and improves the appearance of redness by 66%FeaturesMade with Gauze PadsSized (2.6") to cover a wide areaRounded corners for a perfect fit on skinKey IngredientsTea Tree Calming Biome cold-extracted for 200 hours by adding Lactobacillus to the Jeju Tea Tree, which helps provide soothing care.The Tea Tree Calming Biome is broken down into small particles to quickly and intensively quench irritated skin.Item 2634871How To UseAs a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Methylpropanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Water, Lactobacillus Ferment, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Citrate, Allantoin, Octyldodeceth-16, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract.
how_to_use: As a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.

reviews.headline: Works well for teens
reviews.comments: My 15 yr old daughter has some red bumps on tzone, mostly on forehead and chin. We just got this few days ago. after the first night use, it significantly reduced the bumps and redness. Now she uses this every night. She really likes it.

reviews.headline: works well
reviews.comments: good for acne and sensitive skin! dry skin girlies are safe from excessive drying. Doesn't remove acne but helps calm it down. wearing it as a mask makes my face feel clean but pads are too small for full sheet mask, best to put it only on problem areas only to save pads.

reviews.headline: literal lifesaver
reviews.comments: I've been using these trouble pads for over a month now, and I've noticed how calm it makes my skin! I recently had a cyst show up on my face that was ridiculously inflamed. I decided to place a pad over it and leave it till it dried, and idk how but it reduced the inflammation and made it look smaller. I will forever repurchase theseüôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è

reviews.headline: No thanks
reviews.comments: Small pads that you will need at least 5 of to make a mask. I returned it!

reviews.headline: Sensitive Skin Savior
reviews.comments: Before using this product, I had given up on solving my inflammation and acne. Now both are biting the dust and I hardly wear makeup. I finally feel like a confident 30 year-old!

reviews.headline: great product for acne
reviews.comments: I had painful acne caused by stress and nothing would help. products would help with existing acne but new acne would show up every day.  these pads helped so much. it helped with existing acne and both slowed down and decreased  the amount of new acne. i have much less painful acne and less inflammation.
Love this product for my dry, sensitive, acne prone skin. Helped clear my skin so much and so fast.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Whenever I have a breakout I would put a few pads onto my face and use it like a mask. It really calms my skin down.

reviews.headline: Great for dry, rosacea prone skin.
reviews.comments: I always assumed tea tree would be drying for my face and be counter productive for my rosacea. I bought this bc I read tea tree can help with certain types of rosacea (high mite density) and I thought I would give it a shot. I was surprised to see my face immediately react positively to this. Also it's very moisturizing. I like to let it sit on my skin and dry completely before applying moisturizer and have actually forgotten my moisturizer a few times only to be left with soft moisturized skin. Can't wait to try other products from this line!
